short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture and record live and broadcast sessions by saving them directly to your computer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is only available for users of 2BeLive and requires that you log into your session to begin recording.  This extension will not work on other websites.  
Upon completion of screen recording, you will need to save the recording file to your local device or upload to a cloud storage environment.
